pullRequest.title: Refactor RdbmsConfiguration
pullRequest.bodyText:
For #6687.
Changes proposed in this pull request:

Refactor RdbmsConfiguraton
Refactor SyncConfiguration
Refactor InventoryDataTaskSplitter
Refactor SyncTaskFactory

nodes.bodyText: parameter do not have to align.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: parameter do not have to align.
Please remove Cloneable interface. and impl clone() function in other way.
how about replace SuppressWarnings with generics? or should we extract positionManager to context?
